ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Comments of someone who is Way behind on email!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Either way, I took out the FAQ ;) This is why I ask youse guys to read it once in a while.  I don t play anymore (although I have a friend at work who
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:05 AM 1/29/2001 -0800, you wrote:
> > The FAQ: Talies, in reference to the last question, don't have a 49th song
> > now? Melody of Ervaj from Velious is listed as being 49th level. And
> > speaking of the issues of bad bards, wonder if we could get that fabulous
> > FAQ posted on the Concert Hall. It might possibly help the new crop of
> > bardlings.
> >
>
>The 49 song is Shield of Song. Melody of Erjav is 50th not 49th.


Either way, I took out the FAQ ;)

This is why I ask youse guys to read it once in a while. I don't play
anymore (although I have a friend at work who comes and tells me of his
conquests from the night before EVERY SINGLE DAY!!! *GAAAAHHH!!!*), so I
miss a lot. I just refuse to give money to Verant until they prove that
they've changed. I still don't see it.

Talies the Wanderer
